channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.title: Report E-2024090587
item.description:
Report E-2024090587

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-02T09:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-02
  • City: ELBERTON
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: AIR PRODUCTS AND CHEMICALS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 300000
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: On September 2, 2024 at 0545, a Conyers driver was offloading a liquid oxygen trailer at a remote customer site in northern Georgia. Toward the end of the offload, the driver noticed a small fire beginning near the pump area of the trailer. The driver walked around to the outer side of the trailer to investigate and noticed the fire increasing. The driver immediately shut down the offload, and secured the trailer and customer tanks as he exited the area. Please note that at the time of the event, we were unsure that there was an unintentional release of product. Due to the evacuation, we proactively called the NRC, but have determined that there was no release of product.
